post.body: Andrew won't be visiting me this week, and as I tried to venture forth to indulge in retail therapy, weather&no boots=blah.
Nookie is always good! Good luck! *giggles*
Need a place to crash in May? ;P
I think it follows all @ replies too, which would inflate the amount of posts. One can filter out all but the replies directly to them
Ah haaa, found Rollercoaster Tycoon amongst my archival CDs. Now I have something to do besides curse the weather.
Randomness for lulz: "There was a one-eyed horse at my old stable in Denver. His name was Damn It. :)"
4" more forecast, now. F*, f*, f*. :P
I'm suddenly compiling a CD of Irish Christmas music in the insane hope I can see Andrew tonight. Bwaha, whee! :P
I don't want to go another week without seeing Andrew. Stop snowing! /whine
How in the hell do they go from forecasting 50s to forecasting 20s and 8" new snow in the span of four hours? lol Blahhhh.
Fuck this goddamned life. That is all. *rips hair out*
http://is.gd/d90V I want to drink the iKoolaid someday (man, is that euphemism old) if only to play with this app. lol
I have an unending, dorkish wish to wear latex elf ear tips. In another life, perhaps even bod-mod them. o.O
Oh, the income I could be making right now if I had boots, and a snow shovel, hehe...
http://followcost.com says I'm mildly annoying to follow, but not as much as @krud. ':) (I don't find him annoying at all, so pbbt.)
http://www.wimp.com/flyzone/ I love composites like this. Wish it looped. Funny how when darkness comes, the masses vacate the locale.
Aaaaand the pizza place won't deliver to us. Literally down the street, delivered during snow earlier, but not now. wtf. lol
Ahh,technology.The city is shut down and 2/3 of the busses are not running.But praise be, the spammers are hard at work, filling my email.:)
Due to dwindling fridge supplies, @irony_delerium and I are contemplating the unfortunate step of ordering pizza. It's a dark day. ;)
I keep being surprised as I look out the window and continue to see the snow falling. They were slating 1", wtf did this 5 come from...
